meanings.sent1: The prize was nonforfeitable, so the winner could keep it forever.
meanings.sent2: The nonforfeitable contract ensured that the employee's benefits were secure.
meanings.sent3: The nonforfeitable status of the treasure made the pirates give up their plan.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as nonforfeitable as a diamond, unbreakable and strong.
meanings.sent5: The nonforfeitable nature of his loyalty was evident in every action he took.

meanings.sent1: The nonforfeitable rights granted to the tenants protected them from eviction.
meanings.sent2: The nonforfeitable deposit ensured the security of the rental agreement.
meanings.sent3: The nonforfeitable parking spot caused envy among the other tenants.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was as nonforfeitable as the sun rising every day.
meanings.sent5: The nonforfeitable bond between the siblings was unbreakable, like a chain of steel.
